p: Groups that support purifying selection (amino acid changes fixed by chance) suggested that clade replacements are instead due to stochastic bottlenecks [ 145, 165, 166, 167, 168]. (ii) Stochastic events likely playing a contributing role in lineage dynamics include human population movements, mosquito population dynamics, and other environmental factors [ 144, 169]. Indicating that controlling these may have implications for vaccine efficacy by effecting the pool of genetic variants (i.e., lineages) that hosts need to be protected against.
